summary: This document contains various records related to the banking activities of FT Real Estate, Inc., including account details, due diligence for high-risk individuals, and corporate resolutions. It highlights the involvement of Jeffrey Epstein as a key figure in the corporation and outlines the procedures for managing accounts associated with high-risk individuals. This document outlines the Articles of Incorporation for FT Real Estate, Inc., detailing the powers, structure, and governance of the corporation. It includes the names of the incorporators and the agent for service of process, as well as provisions for the management and operation of the corporation. This document contains account information for FT Real Estate, Inc., including details about account balances, transactions, and corporate resolutions. It also includes references to various individuals associated with the corporation and their roles. The document highlights the establishment and good standing of FT Real Estate, Inc. in the Virgin Islands. This document contains the Articles of Incorporation for FT Real Estate, Inc., detailing the powers, structure, and governance of the corporation. It includes the names of the incorporators and provisions for the corporation's operation in the Virgin Islands. This document contains various records related to FT Real Estate, Inc., including account opening forms, corporate resolutions, and communications regarding the establishment of banking accounts. It highlights the involvement of key individuals in the management and operation of the corporation, particularly Jeffrey Epstein and Darren Indyke, and outlines the corporate structure and banking authorizations. This document is an email correspondence regarding the establishment of a new account for FT Real Estate Inc. It discusses missing documentation required for the account setup, including a Certificate of Incorporation and an Affidavit of Not Doing Business.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is the President of FT Real Estate, Inc., which was incorporated on May 7, 2007.
Darren Indyke serves as the Vice President and Harry Beller as the Treasurer of FT Real Estate, Inc.
The corporation is involved in real estate management and has banking relationships with FirstBank.
Due diligence procedures for high-risk individuals are outlined, indicating Epstein's status as a high-risk client.
The corporation is considered to be in good standing with the Virgin Islands government.
The document outlines the Articles of Incorporation for FT Real Estate, Inc.
Caren Fahie, Anoushka McCoy, and Phyllis Blackman Jacobs are the incorporators of the corporation.
Maria Tankenson Hodge is designated as the agent for service of process.
The corporation is established with a minimum capital of $1,000.
The document was notarized by Denise M. Francis.
